sessions.sessionExists: A session with this name already exists
sessions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action cannot be undone.

products.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this product? All associated pages will also be deleted.

pages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this page?

bundles.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this bundle?

alternatives.title: Manage Alternatives
alternatives.quantityInfo: Each product in an option can have its own quantity. This will override the product's default quantity.
alternatives.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
alternatives.overrideNotice: Quantities specified here will override the product quantities during optimization.
alternatives.errorOptionEmpty: Each option must have at least one product selected.
alternatives.errorMinOptions: Please add at least two options with selected products.

deliveryRules.title: Delivery Rules
deliveryRules.subtitle: Configure delivery settings for each seller.
deliveryRules.sameFee: Same calculation method for all products
deliveryRules.freeDeliveryCondition: Free delivery from a minimum order amount?
deliveryRules.billingMethodSameFeeHelp: Use the same calculation formula for all products from this seller.
deliveryRules.billingMethodDependsHelp: Allows dividing products into groups (e.g., small vs. large items) with different fee calculations.
deliveryRules.typeFixedHelp: A single fixed amount applied to the entire order (e.g., $10 shipping).
deliveryRules.typePercentageHelp: Fees are calculated as a percentage of the total order price (e.g., 5% of cart).
deliveryRules.typeQuantityHelp: Price depends on the number of items (e.g., $2 per item, or quantity tiers).
deliveryRules.typeItemHelp: Sums up individual shipping fees defined for each item on its product page.
deliveryRules.typeDistanceHelp: Price depends on the delivery distance (e.g., $1 per mile).
deliveryRules.typeWeightHelp: Price depends on the total weight of the order (e.g., $5 up to 2kg, then $10).
deliveryRules.typeVolumeHelp: Price depends on the total volume (space) of the order.
deliveryRules.typeDimensionHelp: Define a list of standard shipping formats. The system will automatically choose the appropriate format based on the product or order dimensions.
deliveryRules.typeWeightVolumeHelp: Define shipping formats based on maximum allowed weight and volume.
deliveryRules.typeWeightDimensionHelp: Define shipping formats combining weight and dimensions. Useful for listing rates by parcel sizes (S, M, L...).
deliveryRules.freeDeliveryHelp: Delivery is completely free for this seller or group.
deliveryRules.tierTypeHelp: Unique tier: the reached tier applies to the whole order (e.g. $15 purchase in the $10-$20 range at $3 -> $3 total). Progressive tiers: each tier only apply to its own bracket (e.g. $15 purchase -> $10 at first rate + $5 at next rate).
deliveryRules.tieredMaxLimitHelp: Tiered rates are based on maximum limits. If any single measurement exceeds the limit, the next tier applies.
deliveryRules.tierValueModePerUnitHelp: The amount/value is multiplied by the measurement (items / km / kg / L).
deliveryRules.tierValueModeTotalHelp: The amount is a total applied to the order if the tier is reached.
deliveryRules.tierValueModeQuantityPerUnitHelp: The value is multiplied by the number of items.
deliveryRules.tierValueModeDistancePerUnitHelp: The value is multiplied by the distance.
deliveryRules.tierValueModeWeightPerUnitHelp: The value is multiplied by the weight.
deliveryRules.tierValueModeVolumePerUnitHelp: The value is multiplied by the volume.
deliveryRules.confirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure you want to delete this customs category?
deliveryRules.customsClearanceFeesHelp: These fees are for certain delivery services that charge for customs declaration processing and advance payment of applicable taxes.

scraping.title: Add to Product
scraping.pageOrBundle: Is this a page or bundle?

modals.howManyNeeded: How many times this product is needed
modals.compatibilityHelp: If this product is not compatible with all the others, select which ones.
modals.compatibilityHelpEdit: If this product is not compatible with all the others, you will need to select which ones.
modals.alternativeGroupWarning: This product is part of alternative groups. The group quantity may override this value during optimization.
modals.noKnownParser: This website doesn't have a known parser. Please enter the details manually.
modals.bundleExplanation: A bundle contains multiple products with a single price and shipping cost.
modals.itemsPerPurchaseHelp: How many items are included in one purchase (e.g., 2 for a pack of 2)
modals.maxPerPurchaseHelp: Maximum number of times you can purchase from this page
modals.maxPerPurchaseHelpBundle: Maximum number of times you can purchase from this bundle
modals.howToAddCategory: To add a new category, go to Delivery Rules > Customs Tax Configuration

tier.maxMustBeGreaterThanMin: Maximum must be greater than minimum
tier.gapBetweenTiers: Gap detected - must continue from previous tier
tier.lastTierMustBeInfinity: Last tier must have no maximum (âˆž)
tier.atLeastOneTierRequired: At least one tier is required
tier.fixErrorsBeforeSaving: Please fix all validation errors before saving
